level.heading: Composition and organization of the Water Quality Assurance Advisory Panel.

level.text: The Panel established under ยง 34-2202.06e shall be composed of 9 experts who, at a minimum, demonstrate knowledge in at least one of the following professional fields:
Of the 9 Panel members, one shall be the General Manager or the General Manager's designee, and one shall be a representative from the Washington Aqueduct.
Panel members shall be appointed by the Mayor in consultation with the General Manager and the Council.

level.heading: Effect of Amendments
level.text: The 2013 amendment by D.C. Law 19-240 added this section.
